name: Thiago M. Paixão
description: Thiago M. Paixão is a Brazilian researcher and Associate Professor of Computer Science at the Federal Institute of Espírito Santo (IFES). His career combines applied research and teaching in artificial intelligence, with expertise in computer vision and, more recently, natural language processing. He holds a Ph.D. in Computer Science from the Federal University of Espírito Santo (UFES), during which he worked as a visiting researcher at the École de Technologie Supérieure in Montreal, Canada.

At IFES, Thiago advises research in the Applied Computing graduate program and teaches in the Bachelor’s program in Information Systems. His current research interests include Large Language Models (LLMs), Visual Language Models (VLMs), self-supervised learning, and emotional analysis applied to mental health.
